meta.title: Claudiu Morogan - Senior Software Engineer
meta.description: Senior Software Engineer specializing in Oracle PL/SQL Architecture and Full-Stack PHP Development with over 10 years of enterprise experience.
meta.keywords: PL/SQL, Oracle, PHP, Full-Stack Developer, Software Engineer, Database Architecture

hero.name: Claudiu Morogan
hero.headline: Senior Software Engineer specializing in Oracle PL/SQL Architecture and Full-Stack PHP Solutions
hero.subheadline: Over a decade of experience building enterprise tools for global leaders like Oracle and Orange

about.title: Professional Summary
about.content: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience architecting and implementing enterprise-grade solutions. Deep expertise in Oracle database technologies, PL/SQL development, and full-stack PHP applications. Proven track record of delivering scalable systems for major corporations including Oracle, Orange, and Wolters Kluwer. Specialized in database optimization, application performance tuning, and building robust backend architectures that power business-critical operations.

positions.title: PL/SQL Developer
positions.description: Leading database development initiatives and full-stack application delivery.
achievements: Architected and implemented complex PL/SQL solutions according to enterprise requirements
Managed Oracle database maintenance, optimization, and performance tuning
Developed and maintained PHP applications aligned with business objectives
Ensured high availability and reliability of production database systems

positions.title: Senior Engineer / PHP Developer
positions.description: Senior engineer on the LexForce platform, delivering critical legal technology solutions.
achievements: Designed and developed enterprise web applications using PHP within the LexForce legal platform
Optimized database schemas and implemented robust data models for legal content management
Managed Linux server environments and containerized applications using Docker
Streamlined development workflow through Git best practices and team collaboration
Integrated third-party APIs to extend platform functionality

positions.title: APEX PL/SQL Developer
positions.description: Core developer building internal Oracle applications and tools.
achievements: Designed and developed enterprise applications using Oracle APEX and PL/SQL
Created complex stored procedures, functions, and packages per technical specifications
Built intuitive web interfaces using APEX framework for internal business tools
Architected database schemas optimized for application requirements
Delivered custom SQL queries and reporting solutions for analytical needs

positions.title: Customer Service System Reporting Specialist Developer
positions.description: Specialized developer for customer service reporting systems and automation.
achievements: Developed PL/SQL solutions for customer service data processing and reporting
Maintained and optimized Oracle and MySQL databases for telecom operations
Built full-stack PHP applications using CodeIgniter and Yii2 frameworks
Automated business processes using Talend OpenStudio ETL platform
Delivered analytics and reporting tools for customer service operations

positions.title: Software Application Developer Engineer
positions.description: Application developer focused on internal business tools.
achievements: Developed enterprise applications using PL/SQL and Oracle APEX
Maintained and enhanced existing application portfolio
Collaborated with business stakeholders to translate requirements into technical solutions

positions.title: Analyst Programmer
positions.description: Full-stack developer managing databases and internal applications.
achievements: Maintained multi-database environments (MySQL, Oracle 11G, SQL Server)
Developed internal PHP applications using CodeIgniter framework
Maintained legacy applications in FoxPro and Delphi
Managed Windows server infrastructure and provided technical support

items.name: Oracle APEX Enterprise Suite
items.description: Architected and delivered comprehensive business application suite using Oracle APEX, serving multiple departments with custom workflows and reporting.

items.name: LexForce Legal Platform Enhancement
items.description: Led development of critical features for Wolters Kluwer's legal technology platform, enhancing functionality for legal professionals.
highlights: Implemented API integrations for third-party legal data

items.name: Telecom Customer Service Automation
items.description: Built automated reporting and data processing pipeline for Orange Romania's customer service operations.
highlights: Reduced report generation time from hours to minutes
Processed millions of customer service records

degrees.description: Advanced studies in systems theory, automation, and information technology
Focus on business information systems and database management

other.title: Additional Information
items: Available for remote and on-site work
Open to consulting and contract opportunities
